SELECT c.id, au.avatar, au.nickname, IF(rau.nickname is null,'æ— ',rau.nickname) as replyNickname, a.title as articleTitle, c.content, c.create_time FROM blog_article_comment c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, user_info_id FROM sys_user ) u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM blog_user_info ) au ON u.user_info_id = au.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, title FROM blog_article ) a ON c.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, user_info_id FROM sys_user ) ru ON c.reply_user_id = ru.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM blog_user_info ) rau ON ru.user_info_id = rau.id
au.nickname like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or rau.nickname like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
order by c.create_time desc

select c.*, ui.nickname as nickname, ui.web_site as webSite, ui.avatar as avatar from blog_article_comment c left join sys_user u on c.user_id = u.user_id left join blog_user_info ui on u.user_info_id = ui.id where c.article_id = #{articleId} and c.parent_id is null order by c.create_time desc
select c.content as commentContent,c.create_time,a.title,a.id from blog_article_comment c left join blog_article a on c.article_id = a.id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.create_time desc
